p: Here we used a phylogenetic approach to investigate DENV circulation in the southern provinces of Thailand during 2015â€“2016 and determine the origins and routes of introduction of the DENV strains. While previous studies focused on a single serotype [ 26, 27] or were restricted in certain areas in Thailand [ 28, 29], our objective is to explore, for the first time, the local genetic diversity of the four DENV serotypes and determine whether new strains are emerging or if a switch of genotype is ongoing in Southern Thailand.
